fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / LORRY CONCLUSIONS
fields.Description: A post-lorry-search dialogue with Kim, going over the necessary information and coming to some conclusions.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""A lot of women there. Especially f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A lot of women there. Especially for a lady driver's cabin."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should return to the murder cas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should return to the murder case. See what Joyce tells us about the lynching. When we're done for the day, I'll call my station and suggest our narcotics department look into it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And last but not least, it looks l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And last but not least, it looks like the Hardie boys knew this driver, as we know that she was present at the lynching. This may be the Union connection we've been searching for."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm going to say -- no.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to say -- no."

fields.Title: Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true
Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true
!(Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_article"] == true)
Esprit de Corps: "Unimportant?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Unimportant?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We didn't find anything *conclusiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We didn't find anything *conclusive* linking them to the smuggling operation, but somehow I doubt that Evrart Claire would be oblivious to something like this happening right under his nose."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And last but not least, it's *Ruby..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And last but not least, it's *Ruby's cabin* we found. This is an undeniable connection to the Union."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm especially intrigued by that r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm especially intrigued by that radio transmitter -- particularly the sheer number of stations it can connect. Looks like this alleged drug trade casts a wide net."

fields.Title: You: ""The Union really is in neck-deep w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Union really is in neck-deep with everything around here, isn't it?"

fields.Title: You: ""What about the movie posters? How..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about the movie posters? How do they factor into all this?"

fields.Title: Variable["TASK.confront_hardie_about_drug_trade"]
Variable["TASK.confront_hardie_about_drug_trade"]
!(Variable["TASK.confront_hardie_about_drug_trade"])
You: ""I don't think there's anything to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think there's anything to discuss." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Klaasje might have been right abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Klaasje might have been right about Ruby -- she looks awfully lot like one of the poster girls in the cabin."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The probe and the case *converged*,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The probe and the case *converged*, he thinks. This was quite the find.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly, I'm quite worried by wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I'm quite worried by what we've seen so far. The evidence seems to point to a rather extensive and well-organized operation."

fields.Title: Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_maps"] == true
Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_maps"] == true
!(Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_maps"] == true)
You: ""Okay -- debrief over?" [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay -- debrief over?" [Leave.]

fields.Title: lorryfinaleswitch
You: ""Corruption?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Corruption?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps you're right..." He stops..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps you're right..." He stops to think. "This is one connection I find a little dubious, to be honest. I prefer not to profile people's emotions. Perhaps it's because I'm not very good at it, but still."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One way or another, they seem to b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One way or another, they seem to be -- logistically, if nothing else. But don't expect to bust this open during our stay here. At best, this is an angle we can use against them. To other ends. As extra ammunition."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure what the ULAN frequen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure what the ULAN frequencies are all about, but they may hold some significance. Perhaps it's a better way to connect between fleets while avoiding frequency bleed, or maybe it's used to tap into RCM networks..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [littlemainhub]
Rhetoric: "He just doesn't like flimsy connect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He just doesn't like flimsy connections. Especially of *this* kind.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My suggestion is -- we use it agai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My suggestion is -- we use it against the Union in any way we can. To our own ends. It's a slippery eel, but we just might be able to pin them down *indirectly*. Down the road."

fields.Title: You: ""Could the film industry be involve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could the film industry be involved?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Meaning: someone as slippery as Evr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Meaning: someone as slippery as Evrart won't be caught by a couple of cops and some stuff they found in some cabin.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As... *elegant* as they are, I don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As... *elegant* as they are, I don't think they are relevant to the drug trade."

fields.Title: Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true
Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true
!(Variable["jam.abandoned_seen_radio"] == true)
You: ""Will the RCM open an investigation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Will the RCM open an investigation into this?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Listening in on your calls? Between..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listening in on your calls? Between you and your station? A worrying prospect...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There are more than enough grounds..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are more than enough grounds to start an official investigation -- some time later, when we're done here. We do *not* want to get caught in that..." He stops to think.

fields.Title: Logic: "This means it's well funded. Techno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This means it's well funded. Technology like that... a major player must be financing it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, well..." He doesn't say more."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, well..." He doesn't say more.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "In short: this is a future angle. P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In short: this is a future angle. Possibly a good one.

fields.Title: You: ""Seems like something police would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems like something police would do. What do you think of all this, Kim?"

fields.Title: You: ""So it turns out this *is* is conne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it turns out this *is* is connected to the Union."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like Joyce told us, yes -- logisti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like Joyce told us, yes -- logistically. But don't expect to bust this open during our stay here. At best, this is an angle we can use against them. To other ends. As extra ammunition."

fields.Title: Jump to: [littlemainhub]
Empathy: "Actually, he's not bad at it at all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, he's not bad at it at all.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.hardie_went_through_ruby_info"]
Variable["whirling.hardie_went_through_ruby_info"]
!(Variable["whirling.hardie_went_through_ruby_info"])
You: ""How do you think this is connected..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you think this is connected to the Union?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The fact that one hasn't started a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fact that one hasn't started already gives me pause. An investigation, I mean. Especially if the Madre grouping is involved... and I can't imagine they aren't. It's certainly worrisome."

fields.Title: Jump to: [littlemainhub]
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods -- but he's not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods -- but he's not happy.

fields.Title: Jump to: [littlemainhub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, and the maps we found. They re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, and the maps we found. They reveal the *geographical* extent of the operation -- looks like they've used abandoned tunnels and access roads to stay hidden. This is useful info."

fields.Title: littlemainhub
You: ""Maybe the trader is some sort of c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the trader is some sort of cinephile."

fields.Title: You: ""What are you thinking?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you thinking?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "All the same, I don't lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "All the same, I don't like the idea of Internal Affairs descending on the matter. That won't help anyone either."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Don't be fooled, desire always play..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be fooled, desire always plays a role.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Debrief over," he nods. "After you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Debrief over," he nods. "After you."
